title: Yogi the Easter Bear
overview: Ranger Smith arranges a truckload of candy for the Parkâ€™s Easter celebaration, and Yogi helps himself to the entire truck. To fix things, Boo Boo and Yogi set off to find the real Easter Bunny, who has been kidnapped. It's up to Yogi and Boo Boo to save the Easter Bunny and Ranger Smith's reputation!
